Comparison of verbs from VCP and SKD dictionaries.

March 03 2020

Match 0001: vcp=aMSa, skd=aMSa

vcp

k1=aMSa, L=4
aMSa¦ viBAjane ada0 cu0 uBa0 . aMSayati te AMSiSat ta .
aNkApayatItivat Apuki aMSApayatItyeke . ac aMSaH
u--aMSuH Rini aMSI kta aMSitaH .

skd

k1=aMSa, L=5
aMSa¦, t ka viBAjane . aMSakaraRe . iti kavikalpa-
drumaH . tAlavyopaDaH . viBAjana iti BAja t ka tu
pfTakkftyAM ityasya rUpaM . aMSayati aMSApayati
DanaM vaRik . iti durgAdAsakftaDAtudIpikA ..

Match 0002: vcp=aMsa, skd=aMsa

vcp

k1=aMsa, L=24
aMsa¦ viBAjane ada0 cu0 uBa0 aMsayati te AMsisat ta .
Apuki aMsApayatItyeke . vi + viSlezakaraRe pracyAvane ca
“vyaMsayAmAsa tat sEnyamiti” BAratam . ac aMsaH .

skd

k1=aMsa, L=21
aMsa¦, t ka viBAjane . aMSakaraRe . iti kavi-
kalpadrumaH .. dantyopaDaH . viBAjana iti BAja
t ka tu pfTakkftyAM ityasya rUpaM . aMsayati
aMsApayati DanaM vaRik . iti durgAdAsaH ..

Match 0003: vcp=aka, skd=aka

vcp

k1=aka, L=41
aka¦ vakragatO BvA0 pa0 GawAdi . akati AkIt . akayati .

skd

k1=aka, L=32
aka¦, ma vakragatO . kuwilagamane . iti kavikalpa-
drumaH .. ma akayati akati sarpaH . iti durgA-
dAsaH ..


k1=aka, L=33
aka¦, i ka lakzmaRi . iti kavikalpadrumaH . lakzma
cihnayuktakaraRaM . i ka aNkayati vastraM rajakaH .
nopaDapAWe'pi YernityatvAdDasuNnalopo'nAvitya-
syAprAptO yagAdO aNkyate ityAdO sidDe idit
pAWaScarAderYeranityatvajYApanArTaH . tena aNkatItyapi
syAt . taTAca vopadevaH .
“sidDe nityaRijantatvAnnityanuntve kitAmidit .
nijanityatvaboDArTaM na dfzwo'numbiDiHkvaciditi” ..
asyArTaH . kitAM kAnubanDAnAM nityaRijantatvA-
nnityaYyaMntatvAnnityanuntve nityanakAravattve sidDe
idit idanubanDakaraRaM Rico YeranityatvaboDArTaM .
kintu anumbiDirnakArABAvaH kvacidapi na dfzwaH .
iti durgAdAsaH ..


k1=aka, L=34
aka¦, i Na gatyAM . lakzmaRi . iti kavikalpadrumaH ..
i aNkyate . Na aNkate puRyatIrTezu vfzayugmAnyaSa-
NkitaH . iti halAyuDaH .. iti durgAdAsaH ..

Match 0004: vcp=akza, skd=akza

vcp

k1=akza, L=113
akza¦ vyAptO saMhatO ca BvA0 pa0 vew . akzati akzRoti
AkzIt AzwAm AkzizwAm Anakze . kta azwaH ktin
azwiH Satf akzRuvan i akzi--kanin akza .

skd

k1=akza, L=103
akza¦, na U vyAptO . saMhatO . iti kavikalpadrumaH .
na akzRoti DanaM lokaH . vyApnoti rASIkaroti
vA ityarTaH . U AkzizwAM . AzwAM . iti
durgAdAsaH .


k1=akza, L=104
akza¦, U vyAptO . saMhatO . iti kavikalpadrumaH .
akzati DanaM lokaH . vyApnoti rASIkaroti vA
ityarTaH . U AkzizwAM . AzwAM . iti durgAdAsaH ..

Match 0005: vcp=aga, skd=aga

vcp

k1=aga, L=210
aga¦ vakragatO BvAdi0 para0 GawAdi . agati AgIt . agayati .

skd

k1=aga, L=180
aga¦, ma vakragatO . kuwilagamane . iti kavi-
kalpadrumaH .. ma agayati agati sarpaH . iti
durgAdAsaH ..


k1=aga, L=181
aga¦, i gatO . iti kavikalpadrumaH .. gatyAM i
aNgyate . iti durgAdAsaH ..

Match 0006: vcp=aGa, skd=aGa

vcp

k1=aGa, L=437
aGa¦ pApakaraRe adantacurA0 uBaya0 aka0 . aGayati--te .
AjiGat ta . ac--aGam aGaH .

skd

k1=aGa, L=313
aGa¦ i N gatO (aGi gatO karmmaRi law te idito
num DAtoriti pARinisUtreRa num aNGyate .
karttari law te aNGate) . nindAyAM . AramBe .
jave . iti kavikalpadrumaH .. javo vegagatiH . i
aNGyate . Na aNGate vAyurvegena gacCatItyarTaH .
jave eva kEScit paWyate . iti durgAdAsaH ..


k1=aGa, L=314
aGa¦ t ka tatkftO . iti kavikalpadrumaH .. tat-
kftiH pApakfrtiH . aGayati vyADaH . karmmaRo-
'rTamaDyapAWAdakarmmako'yaM . taTA ca, --
“DAtorarTAntare vftte DAtvarTenopasaNgrahAt .
prasidDeravivakzAtaH karmmaRo'karmmikA kriyA” ..
iti goyIcandraH .. DAtvarTena saha karmmaRa upa-
saNgrahAdityarTaH . krameRodAharaRAni . nadI
vahati kzaratItyarTaH . aGayati vyADaH . Bavati
GawaH . Ahate janaH . iti durgAdAsaH ..

Match 0007: vcp=aNka, skd=aNka

vcp

k1=aNka, L=462
aNka(nka)¦ saMKyAkaraRe cihrayuktakaraRe adantacurAdi0 uBa0
saka0 sew . aNkaya--ti te AYcika--t--ta . aNkA-
payati te iti kecit . “preyAMsamANkayadasO na viDO
kalaNka” ityudBawaH . “puk cetyaNkApayatyapIti” kAma-
DenuH . ac aNkaH . kta aNkitaH lyuw aNkanam
asun aNkaH .

skd

k1=aNka, L=325
aNka¦ t ka pade . lakzmaRi . iti kavikalpadrumaH ..
kaRWyavargAdyopaDaH . padaM saNKyAsaMsTAnaM . lakzma
cihnayuktakriyA . taTA ca, --
“arTakriyEva DAtUnAM kartfvyApAralakzmaRA .
AtmanizWaM kriyArTatvaM DAtvarTezvakriyAtmasu” ..
iti vopadevaH ..
“aNkayatyarisEnyAni yuDi pfzWezu SAyakEH” .
iti halAyuDaH .. aNkayati aNkApayati . iti
durgAdAsaH ..

Match 0008: vcp=aNga, skd=aNga

vcp

k1=aNga, L=499
aNga¦ cihnayuktakaraRe adantacurAdi uBaya0 sakarmmakaH sew .
aNgaya--ti te AYjiga--t ta . matAntare aNgApayati te .

skd

k1=aNga, L=348
aNga¦, t ka pade . (aNgayati cezwayati aNga + Ric
ac .) lakzmaRi . iti kavikalpadrumaH .. kaRWya-
vargatftIyopaDaH . padaM saNKyAsaMsTAnaM . lakzma
cihnayuktakriyA . taTA ca .
arTakriyEva DAtUnAM kartfvyApAralakzmaRA .
AtmanizWaM kriyArTatvaM DAtvarTezvakriyAtmasu ..
iti bopadevaH . aNgayati aNgApayati, iti
durgAdAsaH ..

Match 0009: vcp=aca, skd=aca

vcp

k1=aca, L=604
aca¦ avispazwakaTane gatO ca uBaya0 BvAdi0 saka0 sew ktvA
vew . acati te . AcIt Acizwa . kta aktaH ktvA
acitvA--aktvA “svAhAyajYamityaNgulI acate” iti
kAtyA0 . “acatesaNkocayati” iti vedadIpaH .


k1=aca, L=605
aca(ancu)¦ gatO pUjAyAYca pa0 saka0 sew . tatra aca
idit Yodicca (ancu) avyaktaSabde ca . aYcati AYcIt
ancu--gatO acyAt pUjAyAmaYcyAt . kta aktaH
pUjAyAmuBayoH aYcitaH aci--varttamAne kta aYcitaH .
ancu--ktvA aYcitvA--aktvA aci--aYcitvA . “ayamaYcati
paYcaSarAnucara” iti sA0 wI0 . pra + prakarze pUrbbadik-
kAlavfttO ca prAYcati prAN(pUrbbakAlaH) prAcI (pUrbbA dik)
parA + pratigatO, ABimuKyABAve, paScAdBAve, vahirBAve ca
[Page0082-b+ 38]
parAYcati (parAgacCati) parAN (vAhyaH) . apa +
apasaraRe apAYcati . sam + sundaragamane, yaTocita-
gamane ca samaYcati samyaN . anu + paScAdgatO . anva-
Ycati anvaN . ud + UrdDvagamane, uttaradigvfttO ca
udaYcati (udgacCati) “udaYcadromAYcamiti” udaN deSaH
udIcI (uttarA dik) . pari + samantAdgatO . paryyaYcati .
prati + pratIpagatO, paScAdgatO, paScAdvarttitve ca pratyaYcati
(pratIpaM gacCati) . pratyaN, pratIcI (paScimA dik) . Atmani
vyAptyarTakapratinA yogAt pratyakSabdaH tasya sarvavizaya-
vyApakatvAt pratyaktvam . ni + nyUnIBAve nyaYcati nyaN
nyagBAvaH nyakkAraH . ava + aDogatO, dakziRadigvfttO
ca . avAYcati avAN (aGomuKaH) avAcI (dakziRA dik)
yaTA ca uttaradakziRayoH UrdDAGoBAvastayA avAkSabde
vakzyate .


k1=aca, L=606
aca¦ gatO pUjAyAm idit uBa0 saka0 seW ktvA vew .
aYcati te AYcIt AYcizwa . ktvA aNktvA--aYcitvA .
upasargAt ancuvat . “nyaYcate pratyahaM moho yasmAnnyaYcanti
cAraya” iti kavira0 .

skd

k1=aca, L=432
aca¦ i pUjAyAM . iti kavikalpadrumaH .. i a-
Ycate . aYcu gatipUjanayoriti pUjArTo yaH sa
evAyaM . idit pAWaH pUjAyAM nalopABAvAt .
udanubanDABAvaSca kzuDavasapajArTAYcetyAdinA ktvA-
pratyayasya nizWAyASca nityembiDAnAt . iti durgA-
dAsaH ..


k1=aca, L=433
aca¦ i Ya gatO . mlizwoktO . iti kavikalpa-
drumaH .. i aYcyate . Ya aYcati aYcate . iti
durgAdAsaH ..


k1=aca, L=434
aca¦ u Ya gatO mlizwoktO . iti kavikalpa-
drumaH .. acati acate . u acitvA (udito
vA itIqaBAvapakze) aktvA . mlizwoktiravyakta-
SabdaH . iti durgAdAsaH ..

Match 0010: vcp=aja, skd=aja

vcp

k1=aja, L=664
aja¦ zatO kzepaRe ca BvAdi0 para0 saka0 sew . ajati .

AjaH . “ajanti vahniM sadanAnyacCa” iti vedaH .

te . AYjijat ta .

skd

iti durgAdAsaH ..


k1=aja, L=461
aja¦ ika BAsi (aji dIptO curA iditvAnnum .)
iti kavikalpadrumaH .. ika aYjayati . BAsi
doptO . iti durgAdAsaH ..

Match 0011: vcp=awwa, skd=awwa

vcp

k1=awwa, L=791
awwa¦ atikrame baDe ca BvAdi0 Atma0 saka0 sew . awwate .

at . wopaDasya tu Awiwwizate awiwwat kvip aw .


k1=awwa, L=792

Awiwwat .

skd

k1=awwa, L=565

mUrdDvanyavargAdyopaDaH . Na awiwwizate dantyavargA-
dyopaDaH . Na atiwwizate . dantyavargatftIyo-
paDaH . Na awwitizate KalaM rAjA . iti
durgAdAsaH ..

Match 0015: vcp=ata, skd=ata

vcp

k1=ata, L=834
ata¦ vanDane idit BvA0 para0 saka0 sew . antati . AntIt
“samantati kapota iva gataDimiti” vedaH .


k1=ata, L=835
ata¦ banDane BvAdi0 para0 saka0 sew . atati . AtIt .

skd

k1=ata, L=607
ata¦, i banDane (iditvAt num BvAdiM sew paraM)
iti kavikalpadrumaH .. atIti banDe . Sezo dIrGA-
dirityanyaH . ataeva antyate Intyate . svamate tu
antyate intyate . Cando'nuroDAduBayatra ikAraH ..
iti durgAdAsaH ..


k1=ata, L=608
ata¦ I banDane . iti kavikalpadrumaH ..


k1=ata, L=609
ata¦ sAtatyagate . iti kavikalpadrumaH .. sAtatyagataM
nErantaryyeRa BramaRaM prApaRaYca . atati vAyuH .
atati sUryyo gaganaM prApnotItyarTaH . iti durgA-
dAsaH .

Match 0016: vcp=ada, skd=ada

vcp

k1=ada, L=1112
ada¦ banDane BvA0 para0 idit saka0 sew . andati AndIt .


k1=ada, L=1113
ada¦ BakzaRe ca adA0 para0 saka0 aniw . atti ava-
sat jaGAsa attA atsyati . sani jiGatsati . kta--odanArTe
annam anyatra jagDam GaY GasaH--AdaH ktin jagDiH .
“yo'nnamatti yatastata” iti smftiH . “attA carAcara-
grahaRAditi” SA0 sU0 . “kimadanti BfNgA” iti .

skd

k1=ada, L=751
ada¦ i banDe . (BvAdi parasmEpadI sew idit) iti
kavikalpadrumaH .. i andyate . iti durgAdAsaH ..


k1=ada, L=752
ada¦ la O BakzaRe (aniw parasmepadI adAdi .)
iti kavikalpadrumaH .. la atti . O attA .
gaRakftamanityamiti nyAyAt SapaHsTitO ada-
tItyapIti vararuciH . iti durgAdAsaH ..

Match 0017: vcp=ana, skd=ana

vcp

k1=ana, L=1455
ana¦ jIvane adA0 para0 aka0 sew . aniti AnIt . GaY
AnaH, acnaH, lyuw ananam . Anayati aninizati .
kvip at “sarvaM KalvidaM brahma tajjalAniti viSve ca-
nedanA f0 430, 3, anA prAReneti BA0 CA0 upa0
“yadyeza AkASa Anando na syAt kohyevAnyAt?
kaH prARyAt? iti SrutiH “prARivastava mAnArTamiti”
BawwiH . prAdyupasargatoviSezagatyarTatA . pra + prAggatO, prARaH
apa + aDogatO apAnaH, ud + urdDvagatO udAnaH, vi +
A + vizvaggatO vyAnaH, sam + samantAdgatO samAnaH . “yadvE
prARiti sa prARaH yadapAniti so'pAnaH” iti SrutiH .
jIvanaM ca prARaDAraRaM tena DAtvarTagfhItakarmakatvAdakarmakaH
yasya saMyogAt dehanirmmARamityuktamaDizWAnaSabde . upa-
sarganimittAt halantatve'pyasya RatvaM prAR .


k1=ana, L=1456
ana¦ jIvane divA0 Atma0 aka0 sew . anyate Anizwa .

skd

k1=ana, L=926
ana¦ Ga lu prARane . jIvane . iti kavikalpadrumaH ..
Ga lu aniti loko jIvati ityarTaH . iti durgA-
dAsaH ..


k1=ana, L=927
ana¦ Na ya prARane . jIvane . iti kavikalpadrumaH ..
ya Na anyate . iti durgAdAsaH ..

Match 0018: vcp=anja, skd=anja

vcp

k1=anja, L=2186
anja¦ gatO kAntO mrakzaRe vyaktO ca ruDA0 varttamAne kta
Udit vew para0 . anakti . sici parasmEpade nityamiw .
AYjIt--AnaYja . aYjitA--aNktA . aYjizyati--Nkzyati .
kta aktaH . ktin aktiH . ktvA--aktvA aYjitvA . vi + prakA-
Sane . vyanakti vyajyate “vyanakti kAlatritaye'pi yogyatA-
miti” mAGaH . GaY vyaNgaH . Ryat vyaNgyaH . “savyaNgya-
muttamaM kAvyamiti” . Ric . vyaYjayati lyuw . vyaYja-
[Page0195-a+ 38]
nam . “anyArTaDIkft vyApftiraYjanam” kA0 pra0 .
karttari lyu . vyaYjanA ekatrArTe'nyaDIheturvyaYjanA sABiDA-
Srayeti” sA0 da0 .

skd

k1=anja, L=1217
anja¦ u Da Yi vyaktO . gatO . mrakzaRe . iti kavi-
kalpadrumaH .. u aYjizyati aNkzyati . Da anakti .
Yi aktosti . vyaktiH sPuwIkaraRaM .
“SarIraBAjAM BavadIyadarSanaM
vyanakti kAlatritaye'pi yogyatAM” .
iti mAGaH .. anakti gAtraM tElena janaH . iti
durgAdAsaH ..

Match 0022: vcp=arca, skd=arcca *

vcp

k1=arca, L=4372
arca¦ pUjAyAm uBa0 BvAdi0 saka0 sew . arcati te ArcIt
Arccizwa . Anarca--rce “pitFScEvAzwakAsvarccet” manuH .
“evaM hi sarvaBUtAni brAhmaRonityamarcati” manuH .
“ratnapuzpopahAreRa CAyAmAnarca pAdayoH” raGuH
“vfndizWamArccIdvasuDADipAnAm” “samIhe marttumAnarce
tena vAcA'KilaM balam” . “ArccIt dvijAtIn para-
mArTavindAn” “prAnarccurarcyaM jagadarcanIyam” “viprAnarcaM-
staTA stuvan” iti ca BawwiH arciH arcakaH arcitaH
arcitavAn arcitum arcitvA .


k1=arca, L=4373
arca¦ pUjAyAM curA0 uBa0 saka0 sew . arcayati te Arci-
cat ta . arcayAmAsa . “dUrasTamArcayedenam manuH .
“svargOkasAmarcitamarcayitvA” kumA0 .

skd

k1=arcca, L=2184
arcca¦, ka, pUje . (curAdi -- saka -- sew .) iti
kavikalpadrumaH .. ka arccayati . govardDanastvima-
mAtmanepadinaM matvA viBrAjase makaraketanamarcca-
yantItyAdi sKalitamityAha . iti durgAdAsaH ..


k1=arcca, L=2185
arcca¦, Ya, pUje . (BvAdi -- saka -- sew .) iti kavi-
kalpadrumaH .. Ya arccati arccate . iti durgAdAsaH ..

Match 0023: vcp=arjja, skd=arjja

vcp

smftiH “parasvAnyarjayannArIranyadIyAH parAmfSan”
BawwiH . arjjayitum arjjayitvA .

skd

k1=arjja, L=2195
arjja¦, arjjane . (BvAdi -- paraM -- sakaM sew .) iti
kavikalpadrumaH .. arjjanamalabDasya lABaH . yaSa-
ScArjjati yaH sTiramiti halAyuDaH . iti
durgAdAsaH ..

Match 0033: vcp=Apa, skd=Apa

vcp

k1=Apa, L=7029
Apa¦ prAptO vA curA0 uBa0 pakze svAdi0 pa0 saka0 aniw .
Apayati te Apipat ta . pakze Apnoti ApnutaH
Apnuvanti ApnuyAt Apnotu Apnot Apnuvam . Apat
Apa ApaTuH ApuH ApiTa . AptA ApyAt Apsyati
Apsyat . AptavyaH Apyam ApanIyam AptA
AptaH AptiH AtvA avApya . kvip hraKaH ApaH apaH
adBiH . asun ApaH . Satf Apnuvan tAcCIlye cAnaS
ApnuvAnaH . “ayaSomahadApnoti” “ihAgryAM kIrtti-
mApnoti” manuH . “natvevADO sopakAre kOzIdIM vfdDimA-
pnuyAt” yA0 smftiH “putramevaMguRopetaM cakravarttina-
mApnuhi” Saku0 “yena Sreyoha'mApnuyAm” gItA “sa duzpA-
payaSAH prApat” raGuH . “SataM kratUnAmapaviGnamApa saH”
raGuH . “yadidaM sarvaM mflunAptam” SrutiH “nAnavAptamavAptavyaM
vartta eva ca karmmaRi” gItA . karmmaRi Apyate Api .
preraRe Ric . Apayati te Apipat ta . san Ipsati
IpsitaH .
pra + prakarzeRAptO prApnoti prAptaH prAptiH “aprAptasya ca yAprAptiHsaMyogaH sa udAhftaH” BAzA0 .
sam + saMpUrRRatAyAM samAptaH samAptiH samApanam .
ava + prAptO, “anavAptamavAptavyam” gItA “tapaH kiledaM tadavApti sADanaM” kumA0 .
pari + pracuratve samarTatve samuditatve paryyAptaH paryyAptiH .
“sahi DarmaH suparyyAptaH sarvasya padavedane” gItABA0 .
[Page0740-b+ 38]
“aparyyAptaM tadasmAkaM balaM BIzmABirakzitam . paryyApta
tvidametezAM balaM BImABirakzitam” gItA .
anu + prA--paScAtprAptO “nadIM gaNgAmanuprAptAH” BA0 A0 pa0 .

IkzaRIyaH IkzyaH IkzitA IkzitaH IkzitvA vIkzya . Ikza-
Ram IkzA . IkzamARaH . karmmaRi Ikzyate IkzyamARaH .

kzyate” na kAmavfttirvacanIyamIkzate” kumA0 . “tadEkzata
bahu syAM prajAyeya” SrutiH . “sa prajApatirIkzAM cakre”

yogayuktAtmA” gItA . “kaTamIkzAmahe sarve, duryyoDana!

RyarTe'pi . “apejate SUro asteva SatrUn” f0 6, 64,

gatO udejate . “udejatu prajApati rvfzA SuzmeRa vAjinA
aTa0 4, 4, 2, “udejayAn BUtagaRAnnyazeDIt” BawwiH .
pra + prakarzacalane pararUpam prejate . sam + saNgatO niya-
mena calane “evedanu dyUn kiraRa0 samejAt” f0 10,
27, 5 . “samejAt niyamena prayAti” BA0 .

cakAra cakre . kaTitaH kaTayitvA kaTayitum--kaTanam .
kaTA “taM janAH kaTayantIha yAvat Bavati gOriyam”
BA0 anu0 3168 “hanta te kaTayizye'mumitihAsaMpurA-
tanam” BA0 4, 45, 9 . “kaTAcCalena bAlAnAM nItistadiha
kaTyate” hito0 “yo manuH kaTyate'zwamaH” devI0 “pratyekaM
kaTitAhyetAH saMkzepeRa dvisaptatiH” manuH .
anu + anuvAde kaTitasyakaTane anvAdeSe anukaTayati anuvadati
prAdyupasarge prakarzAdinA kaTane asya bruvarTatayA dvikarma-
katvam tatra gORe karmaRi lakAraH .

skd

k1=kaTa, L=6129

para--sakaM--sew .) kaTayati . iti durgAdAsaH ..

iti BAgavatam ..)

kunTatIti halAyuDaH . iti durgAdAsaH ..


k1=kuTa, L=8039

akaM-sew .) pUtitvaM durganDIBAvaH . ya, kuTyati

dAsaH ..

Match 0172: vcp=kf, skd=kf

vcp

k1=kf, L=14621
kf¦ kftO BvA0 uBa0 saka0 aniw kavikalpa0 . karati te

k1=kf, L=14622
kf¦ kftO tanA0 uBa0 saka0 aniw . karoti kurute kuryyAt .
karotu kuru akarot akArzIt akfta . cakAra karttA
karizyatite kriyAt kfzIzwa . karmmaRi kriyate
akAriakArizAtAmkArayizAtAm . kAraka karttA
kArI kurvan kurzvARaH cakrivAn cakrARaH . qu--kftrimaH
kftaH kftavAn karaRaM kftiH kriyA kftyA kftvA prakftya .
kftyaM kAryyaH karttavyaH karaRIyaH . Rici kArayati te
acIkarattasani cikIrzati te yaNi cekriyate yaN luki
cari(rI)karIti cari(rI) kartti carkarIti carkartti

“kfYo hetutAcCIlyAnulomyezu” pA0
“ezu dyotyezu karotezwaH syAt . ataH kUkamIti
saH . yaSaskarI vidyA . SrAdDakaraH vacanakaraH” si0 kO0

“divAviBAniSApraBABAskArAntAnantAdibahunAndI-
kimlipilibibaliBaktikarttfcitrakzetrasaMKyAjaNGAbAhvaha-
ryyattadDanuraruzzu” pA0 .

“ezu kfYazwaH syAt . ahetvAdAvapi . divAkaraH
viBAkaraH niSAkaraH kaskAditvAsaH . BAskaraH
bahukaraH bahuSabdasya vEpulyArTe saMKyApekzayA pfTag-
grahaRam lipilibiSabdO paryyAyO . saMKyA--ekakaraH .
dvikaraH . kaskAditvAtsaH . ahaskaraH . nityam samA-

kfpa¦ kalpane (samprattO) BvA0 Atma0 luNi luwi xwi xNi ca uBa0
vftAdi aka0 vew . asya ftaH rakArasTAne laH . kalpa-
te . akalpat--akalpizwa--akxpta . kalptAsi kalpitAse
kalpsyati kalpsyate--kalpizyate . kalpitavyaH--kalptvyaH

acakalpat ta--acIkxpat ta . kalpitaH kalpanA kalpayitA .
“kxpi sampadyamAne” vArtti0 . etadyoge sampadyamAne
karttari caturTI . BaktirjYAnAya kalpate . “kalpavit kalpa-
yAmAsa vanyAmevAsya saMviDAm” “kxptena sopAnapaTena”
raGuH . “rucisaMprakxptam” BawwiH “prajApatikalpitayajYa-
BAgam” kumAM0 . Cedane ca saka0 “kxptakeSanaKaSmaSruH”
manuH “kalpanaM Cedanam” kullU0 .

sya yo'nukalpe pravarttate” smftiH .
ava + avaDAraRe “anavakxptAvevaH” si0 kO0 .

vi + kalpi--saMSaye vikalpayati saMSete ityarTaH .

yati vAcA'Bilapati” smftiH . mAnasakarmmABilApane
“saMkalpena vinA rAjan! yatkiYcit karute naraH” ti0 ta0 .

riva” BA0 va0 504 Slo0

cAMmbuDim” “jagAhe dyAM niSAcaraH” “jagAhe ca
diSo daSa” BawwiH . “brahmAvarttaM janapadamaDaSCAyayA
gAhamAnaH” meGa0 . “pUrvAparO toyaniDI va-
gAhya” kumA0 avA'llopaH . pakze avagAhya . “tapa-
svigAQAM tamasAm” (prApa) raGuH . aba + vizayIkaraRe ca .

iti durgAdAsaH ..

SuSuBe BUmiH” rAmA0 sa0 14 a0 .


k1=tana, L=22016
tana¦ upakAre SradDAyAM AGAte ca vA0 curA0 uBa0 pakze BvA0
saka0 Sabde aka0 sew . tAnayati te tanati atItanat ta
atAnIt atanIt . vyupasargAt dErGye aka0 dIrGIka-
raRe saka0 . vitAnayati dIrGo Bavati dIrGaM karoti
vA . “vitAnayati yaH kIrttiM vitanatyamalaM yaSaH” kavi-
rahasyam “ayaM vede gaRavyAtyasAt divA0 “GozA GozA-
dindrAya tanyati bruvARaH” f0 6 . 38 . 2 . “tanyati
SabdaM karoti” BA0 . cOrAdikasya adantatvamiti tana-
yitnuSabdArTe mADavaH tanayitnuSabde dfSyam .

durgAdAsaH ..

nyAyasamayaH . uddeSaSabde 1170 ukte'rTe ca . tacCabde
udA0 praSne uddeSakaSabde dfSyam .
upa + anuSAsane upadeSaSabde 1210 pf0 ukte'rTe ca . “upa-
diSati kAminInAM yOvanamada eva lalitAni” sA0 da0
“upadizwamihecCAmi tApasyaM vItakalamazAH” BA0 u0 174 a0
prati + upa + upadeSasya pratirUpopadeSe “vyAGiM prati pratyupade-
kzyAmaH” suSru0 “yadyatprayogavizaye BAvikamupadiSyate
mayA tasyE . tattadviSezakaraRAt pratyupadiSatIva me
vAlA” mAlA0 mi
nir + nirRayena deSane kaTane ca “atuzat pIWamAsanne nira-
dikzacca kAYcanam” BawwiH uccAMraRe ca “nirdiSyamAna-
syAdeSA Bavanti” vyA0 pariBAzA “zazWyantaM nirdiSyamA-
namuccAryamARam” nAgeSaBawwaH .
prati + nir + prakftAnurUpanirdeSe . “taditi prakftaM BAvalakzaRaM
pratinirdiSyate” . yena padena uddeSastenEva padena panaH-
kaTane . uddeSyapratinirddeSyayorekapawapratipAdyatve'pi na
kaTitapadatvadozaH anyapadena nirddeSe tu pratyuta Bagnaprakrama-
tAdozaH yaTAha sA0 da0 “evamukto mantrimuKyErAvaRaH
pratyaBAzata” atra vacaDAtunA prakrAntaM prativacanamapi tenEva
vaktumucitaM tena rAvaRaH pratyavocateti pAWo yuktaH .
evaYca sati na kaTitapadatvadozaH tasyoddeSyaprati-
nirdeSyavyatiriktavizayatvAt . iha hi vacanaprati-
vacanayoruddeSyapratinirdeSyatvaM yaTA
“udeti savitA tAmrastAmra evAstameti ca” ityatra .
yadi padAntareRa sa evArTaH pratipAdyate tadAnyo'rTa iva
pratiBAsamAnaH pratItaM sTagayati . yaTA vA
“te himAlayamAmantrya punaHprekzya ca Sflinam . sidDa-
YcAsmE nivedyArTaM tadvisfzwAH KamudyayuH” atra aSmE-
[Page3598-a+ 38]
iti idamA prakrAntasya tenEva tatsamAnAByAmetadadaHSa-
bdAByAM vA parAmarSo yukto na tacCabdena . yaTA vA
“udvanvacCinnA BUH sa ca patirapAM yojanaSatam” atra
“mitA BUH patyApAM sa ca patirapAmiti” yuktaH pAWaH .
prati + pratirUpadeSane . “BujagagatipratideSitAtmakftyaH” BA0
SA0 367 a0
sam + samyakkaTane samyaktayAdeSe vAcA kaTane ca “aBidUti
kAciditi saMdidiSe” mATaH “nanu sandiSeti sudfSo-
ditayA trapayA na kiYcana kilABidaDe” mAGaH “dadO
sa dayitAM BrAtre mAlAYcAgryAM hiraRmayIm . rAjyaM
sandiSya BogAMSca mamAra vraRapIqitaH” BawwiH “aTa
viSvAtmane gOrI sandideSa miTaH saKIm” kumA0 .

k1=diSa, L=16434

udit DvaMsitvA DvastvA . DvastaH . Dva sasyAtItatvA'BA-

pratiyogitayA kAraRasamavaDAnasya ekatra GawAdO sattvA-

nASAnvayi taTA ca varttamAnAdyutpattikanASapratiyogI
GawAdiriti boDaH . vyutpattivEcitryAcca utpatte
rnASa evAnvayaH na pratiyogini iti boDyam . sAM-
[Page3924-a+ 29]
KyAdisatkAryavAde nASaH tirohitAvasTeti BedaH .
“tadapyaDvasadAsAdya mAhendraM lakzmaReritam” prARA
daDvaMsire gAtraM tastamBe ca priye hate” BawwiH . Arze
kvacit pa0 “BUto devAnAmabrIdugrarUpo DvaMsetyuccE
striHplutena svareRa” BA0 A0 79 a0 . mAlinyAdiBAve

va0 64 a0 “ravijena buDe Dvaste” vf0 saM0 17 a0

pfca¦ samparke adA0 Atma0 aka0 sew . pfkte aparcizwa . papuce Idit . pfkRaH .


k1=pfca, L=33095
pfca¦ saMyamane saka0 samparke aka0 cu0 uBa0 pakze BvA0 para0 sew .
pacaMyati--te parcati . apIpfcat--ta apaparcat--ta apa-
rcIt .

skd

k1=pfca, L=22272
pfca¦, I la Na samparke . iti kavikalpadrumaH ..
(adA0-Atma0-aka0-sew . nizWAyAmaniw .)
I, pfktaH . la Na, pfkte . parIpfcyate . sa ceha
sampfktIBAvaH . sampfkte nABiSastErya iti halA-
yuDaH . sampfkte maDunA cUrRaM Bizagiti tu anta-
rBUtaYyarTatvAditi caturBujaH . iti durgAdAsaH ..


k1=pfca, L=22273
pfca¦, ki saMyamane . samparke . iti kavikalpadrumaH ..
(curA0 pakze BvA0-para0-saka0 sew .) saMyamanaM
banDanam . ki, parccayati parccati duzwaM rAjA .
iti durgAdAsaH ..


k1=pfca, L=22274
pfca¦, Da I samparke . iti kavikalpadrumaH .. (ruDA0-
para0-saka0-aka0 ca-sew . nizWAyAmaniw .)

pApiBirya iti halAyuDaH . I, pfktaH . paparcca .
iti durgAdAsaH ..

nizWAyAM anAyAsakftaM PARwaM ityamaraH ..
ataeva ramAnATo'pi GawAdO PaRa gatO
ityatra gateranyatra . PARayati jano'nAyAsena
janayatItyarTa ityAha . iti durgAdAsaH ..


k1=PaRa, L=23698
PaRa¦, mi Ra gatO . iti kavikalpadrumaH .. (BvA0-
para0-saka0-sew .) mi, PaRayati PARayati .
Ra, PeRatuH paPaRatuH . iti durgAdAsaH ..

Match 1016: vcp=yuja, skd=yuja

vcp

k1=yuja, L=39032
yuja¦ yutO ru0 u0 saka0 aniw . yunakti yuNkte irit
ayujat ayOkzIt ayukta yuyoja yuyuje .
ajantopasargAt udaSca parasmAt Atma0 .
anu + praSne saka0 A0 . anuyuNkte anuyogaH .
aBi + vyavahAreRAskandane (nAliSakarA) saka0 Atma0 aBi-
yuNkte aBiyogaH .
ud + Ayojane saka0 udyame aka0 udyuNkte udyogaH .
upa + Bojane saka0 sambanDaBede aka0 Atma0 upayuNkte
upayogaH .
ni + preraRe saka0 Atma0 niyuNkte . niyogaH .
pari + anu + dUzaRAya praSne Atma0 saka0 . paryyanuyuNkte paryyanuyogaH .
pra + uccAraRe vyavahAraBede ca saka0 Atma0 prayuNkte prayogaH
prati + pratirUpe yoge saka0 A0 pratiyuNkte pratiyogaH .
sam + saMyoge saka0 pa0 saMyunakti saMyogaH .


k1=yuja, L=39033
yuja¦ nindAyAM cu0 A0 saka0 sew . yojayate ayUyujata .


k1=yuja, L=39034
yuja¦ samADO di0 Atma0 aniw . yujyate . yuyuje .


k1=yuja, L=39035

yojayati te yojati . ayUyujat ta . ayojIt .

k1=yuja, L=28653

(ruDA0-uBa0-saka0-aniw .) ir, ayujat
ayOkzIt . Da, yunakti yuNkte GftenAnnaM lokaH .
O, yoktA . iti durgAdAsaH ..


k1=yuja, L=28654

(curA0-pakze BvA0-para0-saka0-sew .) antaH-
sTAdyAdiH . ki, yojayati yojati . saMyamo
banDanam . iti durgAdAsaH ..


k1=yuja, L=28655

Atma0-saka0-sew .) Na ka, yojayate . iti
durgAdAsaH ..


k1=yuja, L=28656
yuja¦, ya O Na samADO . iti kavikalpadrumaH ..
(divA0-Atma0-aka0-aniw .) samADi-
ryogyaBAvaH . ya Na, svayamarTe niyujyate . iti
halAyuDaH . O, yoktA . iti durgAdAsaH ..

sAMgrAmikarItyA parasparABiBavecCA yudDam .

Match 1052: vcp=rADa, skd=rADa

SuBasvAminaH sampradAnatA . “gargo rADyati rAmAya”

skd

k1=rADa, L=29554

dipakze aka0-aniw .) rePAdiH . na,
rADnoti . ya, rADyati . O, arAtsIt .
sidDiriha svAdipakze nizpAdanA . divAdipakze
nizpattiH . annaM rADnoti viprARAM ya iti
halAyuDaH . nizpAdayatItyarTaH . satataM rADyati

sidDirantarBUtaYyarTatvAduBayatrEva nizpAdaneti
govindaBawwaH . iti durgAdAsaH .. (SuBASuBa-
paryyAlocane ca . yaTA, mugDaboDe . “gargo
rADyati rAmAya .” rAmasya SuBASuBaM paryyA-
locayatItyarTaH ..)

durgAdAsaH ..

Match 1183: vcp=vasa, skd=vasa

vcp

k1=vasa, L=40831
vasa¦ snehe Cedane baDe ca saka0 cu0 uBa0 sew . vAsayati te
avIvasat ta . aDi + ganDAdinAsaskAre saka0 .


k1=vasa, L=40832
vasa¦ stamBe divA0 para0 saka0 sew . vasyati irit avasat avA-
sIt udit ktvA vew .


k1=vasa, L=40833
vasa¦ nivAse BvA0 para0 saka0 aniw yajA0 . vasati avAtsIt
uvAsa UsatuH uzitaH uzitvA . aDi + anu + upa--A + vA
vasaterADArasya karmatA aDivasati vEkuRWa hariH si0 kO0
anuvasati upavasati Avasati . upa + aBojane tatra
nADArasya karmatA “ekAdaSyAmupavaset” ityAdi .

avavasat ta .

para0-aka0-aniw .) E, usyAt . O,
avAtsIt . iti durgAdAsaH ..

prItiH . ka, vAsayati banDuH . cakArAt vaDe
ca . iti durgAdAsaH ..


k1=vasa, L=31594
vasa¦, t ka vAse . iti kavikalpadrumaH .. (adanta-
curA0-para0-aka0-sew .) vasayati . iti
durgAdAsaH ..


k1=vasa, L=31595

(divA0-para0-aka0-sew . uditvAt ktvAvew .)
ya, vasyati . u, vasitvA vastvA . ir, avasat
avAsIt avasIt . asmAt puzAditvAnnityaM

yo vasyatyarizviti halAyuDaH . iti durgA-
dAsaH ..

avAkzIt . arTAntare akarmmako'yam . yaTA .

velitA . ayaM kEScinna manyate . iti durgA-
dAsaH ..

Match 1207: vcp=viSa, skd=viSa

vcp

k1=viSa, L=41800
viSa¦ praveSe tu0 para0 saka0 aniw . viSati avikzat .
aDi + upaveSane .
aBi + ni + manasaH sTitihetusaMyogaBede Atma0 etadarTe ADA-
rasya karmatA DarmamaBiniveSate anyatrArTe na karmatA . “yA
yA saMjYA yasmin yasminnaminiviSate” BAzyam . “kvapi-
dapavAdavizaye'pyutsargo'BiniviSate” vyA0 pariBAzA .
upa + AsanAdO sTitiBede .
ni + sTitiBede Atma0 “niviSate yadi SUkaSiKA pade” mEma0
nir + upaBoge “krIqArasaM nirviSatIva bAlye” kumA0 ‘nirvepI-
BftiBogayoH’ amaraH “nirvizwavizayasnehaH” raGu0 .
pra + aByantaragamane .

skd

k1=viSa, L=33178
viSa¦, O Sa praveSe . iti kavikalpadrumaH .
(tudA0-para0-saka0-aniw .) Sa, viSati .
O, avikzat . viveSa kaScijjawilastapovanam .
viparAjiparivyavakrIniviSetyAdinAtmanepadavi-
DAne'pi BartturaNke niviSatI BayAditi raGO .
kevalAt SatfpratyayaM viDAya paScAdupasargayogA-
diti durGawavfttiH . niSabda iha upasargaprati-
rUpako vA . yasmAdviSvamidaM sarvvaM tasya SaktyA
mahAtmanaH . tasmAdevocyate vizRurviSaDAtoH
praveSanAditi purARe vizRuSabdavyutpAdanAt
mUrdDanyAnto'yamiti kecit taccintyam . tAla-
vyAntasyEva sarvvasammatatvAt . iti durgAdAsaH ..

SamitvA SAntvA . Ba ya, SAmyati . ir, aSa-
mat aSamIt . puzAditvAnnityaM Na ityanye . SamaH
SAntIBAvaH . SaSAma vfzwyApi vinA davAgni-
riti raGuH . Sama iti padasya YyantasyApi
samBave SAntIkaraRe'pyayamiti DAtupradIpaH .
‘vareRa SamituM lokAnalaM dagDuM hi tattapaH ..’
iti kumArasamBavam ..
‘vaco niSamyADipatirdivOkasAm .’
ityAdAvanekArTatvAt SrutvetyarTaH .. vA Sama yama
ityatra vASabdasya vyavasTAvAcitvAdasya YO nityaM
hnasvaH Samamati . iti durgAdAsaH ..


k1=Sama, L=34938
Sama¦, Na ka Ya Aloce . iti kavikalpadrumaH ..
(curA0-Atma0-uBa0-iti kecit-saka0-sew .)
AlocaH praRiDAnam . vA Sama yama ityatra
vASabdasya vyavasTAvAcitvAt asya svArTe YO
hnasvABAvaH . Na ka, SAmayate kAryyaM saDIH . Ya,
SAmayati SAmayate .
‘niSAmaya tadutpattiM vistarAdgadato mama ..’
ayamAtmanepadItyanye . iti durgAdAsaH ..

k1=SuWa, L=36015

nATastu BvAdipakze SuzkIBAve . curAdipakze

skd

k1=Scuta, L=36463
Scuta¦ ir kzaraRe . iti kavikalpadrumaH ..
(BvA0-para0-aka0-sew .) dvOtAlavya-
vargAdyayuktatAlavyAdI . Sezo'ntaHsTAdiyuktaSca .
nakArajAvanusvArapaYcamAvityAdiniyame'pyanayo-
stAlavyAditvaM tadvacanasya vyaBicArasUcanArTaM
tena culumpa lope ityAdInAmozWyavargaSezopa-
DatvaM saNgacCate . tena kvipi saMyogAntalope
culum ityAdi sidDam . kintu dvO dantyAdI
iti DAtupradIpakramadISvarO . tena GftaM Scotati
iti GftaScut tamAcazwe iti YO YImaMSceti
qitvAwwilope GftaScayati punaH kvipi Yerlope
Gftaska iti sTite saMyogAdeH sasya lope Gftak
iti kecit .. ira, aScutat aScotIt .
aScyutat aScyotIt . kzara iti AsecanaM
kzaraRaYca . raktamAScyotati kzura iti . idaM
kavacamaScyotIditi . niScyotante sutanukavarI
bindavo yAvadete . iti mAlatyAM gaRakftAni-
tyatvam . iti durgAdAsaH ..

k1=syama, L=47463

mat ta .

sTAdiyuktaH . u, syamitvA syAntvA . Ra,
syematuH sasyamatuH . Sa, syamatI syamantI . iti
durgAdAsaH ..

uBa0-saka0-sew .) antaHsTAdiyuktaH . asya
svArTe YO hrasvo na syAt preraRe YO tu syAde-
veti prAYcaH . svamate manIzAditvAt sidDiH .

tvena . iti durgAdAsaH ..

vcp

k1=hana, L=47774

avaDi . Ric GAtayati jiGAMsati jaGaMnyate” “kuYjaM
hanti kuSAdari” ityAdAvAlaNkArikAH gatO niha-
tArTatAmAhuH .
aBi + AGAtaBede kenacit padArTena saMyogaBede aBiGAtaH .
ava + tupAdyapasarasArTavyApAraBede vrIhInavahanti .
A + kenacit padArTena saMyogAnukUlavyApAra Ahanti AGAtaH .
svANgakarmaRi akarmatve ca Atma0 vakza Ahate .
prati + A + pratyAGAte pratibanDe pratyAhanti .
vi + A paraspareRa viroDe bigezeRa tAqite ca vyAhanti vyAGataH
ud + UrDvaM gatO uttolya hanane ca .
upa + ud + AramBe upodaTAtaH AramBArTaH saNgatiBedaH .
ni + niSezeRa hanane svarAntaraTAtena udAttasvarasampAdane ca
nir + niHSezeRa hanane vajrAdiSabde ca . “nirGAte BUmi-
casane manuH .
parA + pratibanDe niroDe .
prati + pratirADe pratikUlagatO ca .
vi + ati + parasparahanane vyatihAre'pi na Atma0 . vyatiGnanti yoDAH .
sam + samyak hanane samUhaBAve aka0 .
han avya0 hana--BAve vic . 1 ruzAktO 2 anunaye ca medi0 .
karttari vic . 3 hananakarttari tri0 vftrahA brahmahA .

upa + sAmIpyena AnatIkaraRArTaM dAne upaQOkane .
